StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MIGetContractID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @ContractID int OUTPUT AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
SET @ContractID = 0
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CONTRACT WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN SELECT @ContractID = CONTRACT_ID FROM CONTRACT WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
